summary: Implemented a new /privacy-policy route and page component, and added a Footer quick-link to navigate to it via TanStack Router. However, the diff shows changes to an explicitly immutable hook file, and the Privacy Policy page content is truncated so several required sections/contact details cannot be verified from the provided evidence. Also added/modified a project_state.json file that was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Privacy Policy page includes all 8 required section headings (Information We Collect, How We Use Your Information, Data Security, Cookies Policy, Third-Party Services, User Rights, Changes to This Privacy Policy, Contact Us).
missing_requirements.reason: The added PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx file is truncated; only Sections 1 and 2 are visible in the diff summary, so presence of Sections 3â€“8 cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Privacy Policy page includes the provided contact details: Mobile: 76910 29526 and Email: rankawatwebsolutions09@gmail.com.
missing_requirements.reason: The PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx content is truncated before any 'Contact Us' section or contact details are shown, so inclusion of the exact required mobile/email cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify not to modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, but it appears in the modified files list.
BuildRequest does not ask for adding or maintaining a project_state.json file; this appears to be extra metadata outside the requested frontend changes.
